text.text:
❗Important Update

Due to a trade fair taking place in Berlin at the same time, hotel prices had risen sharply by the time of the original date in September. In order to offer you a high-quality event at a fair price, we have decided to move the date. We hope you will agree to this and look forward to seeing you in Berlin from 21st - 23rd October 2024.

Welcome to adaptTo() 2024 – Europe's Leading Adobe Experience Manager Developer Conference!

Embark on a Journey of Digital Mastery in Berlin! 

Mark your calendars for an extraordinary gathering of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) enthusiasts at adaptTo() 2024, taking place in the heart of Berlin at the Kulturbrauerei, from October 21st to 23rd. This isn't just a conference; it's a beacon for digital pioneers, a symposium for the curious, and a celebration of innovation. 

Why Should You Anticipate adaptTo() 2024? 

  • Elite Expertise: Rub shoulders with the brightest minds in AEM development, from seasoned architects to visionary developers. This is where challenges meet solutions, and expertise is shared freely. 

  • Future-Forward Sessions: Engage with a diverse lineup of presentations, workshops, and keynotes designed to deepen your knowledge, enhance your skills, and ignite your creativity in the AEM realm. 

  • Community Connection: Find your tribe among a vibrant community of professionals who share your passion for digital excellence. Networking at adaptTo() goes beyond exchanging business cards – it's about building lasting connections. 

  • Practical Learning: Dive into hands-on labs and interactive showcases that bring theoretical knowledge to life. This is where you'll see the latest AEM features in action and learn how to implement them in your projects. 

Get Ready for an Unforgettable Experience: 

  • Inspirational Stories: Be inspired by industry leaders who are at the forefront of digital innovation. Their journeys from idea to execution are not just talks but a blueprint for what's possible. 

  • Visionary Outlook: Discover what the future holds for AEM and digital experiences at large. adaptTo() 2024 is your window to emerging trends and technologies.

adaptTo() 2024 at a glance:

  • Date: 21st - 23rd October 2024
  • Location: Kulturbrauerei, Berlin
  • Focus: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and related open-source technologies
  • Format: On-site conference
  • Target Audience: AEM developers, enthusiasts of digital technologies
  • Registration: Early bird tickets available until 30th of June, Call for Papers open until 13th of May

Stay Ahead of the Curve:

While ticket sales are not open yet, we invite you to sign up for our newsletter. Be the first to know when tickets become available and get direct access to all the updates and insider info on adaptTo() 2024.

Relive the Magic:

Can't wait for what's in store? Get a taste of the adaptTo() experience by watching the aftermovie from last year's conference. It's more than a recap; it's a portal to the energy, knowledge, and inspiration that define adaptTo().

text_662337239.text:
Join the adaptTo() Journey:

Don't miss this chance to elevate your AEM expertise, connect with like-minded professionals, and be part of the future of digital experiences. Sign up for our newsletter now, and let's pave the way to adaptTo() 2024 together.

See you in Berlin!

Looking back

All talks of recent adaptTo() conferences are published on our channel on Youtube (and linked in the schedule pages: 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2023).
You will find all pictures in our image galleries 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2023 - check it out.
